Package problem1

Class Van

  • java.lang.Object
    • problem1.Vehicle
      • problem1.Van
  • public class Van
extends Vehicle
    Class Van stores information about truck - daily price, booked days, maximum occupancy, if it requires a specialized driver’s license and if it allows different pick-up and drop-off locations

      • Fields inherited from class problem1.Vehicle

    • Constructor Detail

      • Van

        public Van​(java.lang.Double dailyPrice,
           java.lang.Integer bookedDays)
    throws DailyPriceNumericException,
           BookedDaysNumericException
        Constructor for the class Van
        Parameters:
        dailyPrice - - the cost of a single day rental, encoded as Double
        bookedDays - - the number of days the vehicle has been rented out to a client, encoded as Integer
        Throws:
        DailyPriceNumericException - On non-positive dailyPrice
        BookedDaysNumericException - On negative bookedDays

      • bookVehicle

        public boolean bookVehicle​(java.lang.Integer days,
                           java.lang.Integer passengers,
                           java.lang.String pickupLocation,
                           java.lang.String dropoffLocation,
                           java.lang.Boolean hasSpecializedLicense)
                    throws BookedDaysNumericException
        Set the van's number of booked days to the given value if the booking is valid
        Parameters:
        days - - the number of days a client would want to reserve a van, as an Integer
        passengers - - the number of passengers the client would like to seat in the vehicle, as an Integer
        pickupLocation - - the client’s preferred pick-up location, as a String
        dropoffLocation - - the client’s preferred drop-off location, as a String
        hasSpecializedLicense - - whether the client has a specialized driver’s license, as a Boolean
        Returns:
        - whether the client books the vehicle successfully
        Throws:
        BookedDaysNumericException - On negative bookedDays
